headline: Berkshire Hathaway: Load Up While The Market Ignores
summary: Berkshire Hathaway is deploying its $344B cash pile into undervalued stocks like UnitedHealth, while trimming Apple and BAC. See why BRK.A stock is a buy.

headline: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway Earns $25 Every Second Just From Coca-Cola Stock Dividends Alone
summary: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway will earn over $25 every second from Coca-Cola dividends this year.
